[CARDNAME1]を取り除き、[CARDNAME2]を追加札から取得しました: Removed [{{cardName1}}] and gained [{{cardName2}}] from the set aside
[CARDNAME]の上の桜花結晶数が0になりました: The number of Sakura Tokens on {{cardName}} became 0
[CARDNAME]を伏せ札にしてACTを行いました: {{action}}  was made with [{{cardName}}] as a face down card
[CARDNAME]を場に出しました: [{{cardName}}] has been put out to the battlefield
[CARDNAME]を山札の上へ置きました: [{{cardName}}] has been placed on the top of the deck
[CARDNAME]を山札の底へ置きました: [{{cardName}}] has been placed at the bottom of the deck
[LINKEDCARDNAME]の下に封印されていた[CARDNAME]を、捨て: [{{cardName}}] sealed under [{{linkedCardName}}] has sent to played cards pile
[LINKEDCARDNAME]の下に封印されていた[CARDNAME]を、相手: [{{cardName}}] sealed under [{{linkedCardName}}] has sent to opponent's played cards pile
カードを1枚伏せ札にしました: A card was set face down
カードを1枚山札の上へ置きました: A card was placed on the top of the deck
カードを1枚山札の底へ置きました: A card was placed at the bottom of the deck
マシンの造花結晶をNつ燃焼済にしました: Artificial Sakura Tokens on the machine burned as {{count}}
ライフ減少なしで再構成しました: Reshuffle the deck without receive any damage
手札1枚を伏せ札にしてACTを行いました: Set one card in hand to do {{action}}
手札N枚を山札の底に置き、同じ枚数のカードを引き直しました: Placed {{count}} hands at the bottom of the deck, and retracted the same number of cards
最初の手札N枚を引きました: Drew {{count}} cards as the initial hand
桜花結晶と集中力を配置しました: Vigor and Sakura Tokens setting completed.
相手の手札1枚を無作為に選び、捨て札にしました -> [CARDNAME]: Opponent's one hand randomly selected and made it to played cards pile -> [{{cardName}}]]
相手の燃焼済の造花結晶をNつ回復しました: Opponent's {{count}} burned Artificial Sakura Tokens recovered.
計略を公開しました -> PLAN: Reveal the currently active Plan token -> {{plan}}
間合の造花結晶をNつ燃焼済にしました: {{count}} Artificial Sakura Tokens in Distance become burned.
